languages.text: {n}Маражай бросает на вас тлеющий интересом взгляд — и небрежно отвечает Караэлю через плечо.{/n} "Что, этот ожог? Касание мон-кайского лазерного заряда, не более".
{n}Marazhai gives you a look of smouldering hunger and nonchalantly replies to Kharael over his shoulder.{/n} "You mean this burn? It is but a mark from a mon-keigh laser charge."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай бросает на вас тлеющий интересом взгляд — и небрежно отвечает Караэлю через плечо.{/n} "Что, этот ожог? Касание мон-кайского лазерного заряда, не более".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a look of smouldering interest and nonchalantly replies to Kharael over the shoulder.{/n} "You mean this burn? It is but a trace from a mon-keigh laser charge."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai blickt dich mit brennendem Hunger an und antwortet Kharael beiläufig über die Schulter.{/n} "Dieses Brandmal meint Ihr? Das stammt nur von einer Chem-Pan-Sey-Laserwaffe."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a look of smouldering hunger and nonchalantly replies to Kharael over his shoulder.{/n} "You mean this burn? It is but a mark from a mon-keigh laser charge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai blickt dich mit brennendem Hunger an und antwortet Kharael beiläufig über die Schulter.{/n} "Dieses Brandmal meint Ihr? Das stammt nur von einer Chem-Pan-Sey-Laserwaffe."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋看了你一眼，眼神里燃起了饥渴，随后他回过头，若无其事地回答道。{/n}“你是说这处烧伤吗？这不过是猴子的激光枪留下的伤痕罢了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a look of smouldering hunger and nonchalantly replies to Kharael over his shoulder.{/n} "You mean this burn? It is but a mark from a mon-keigh laser charge."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋看了你一眼，眼神里燃起了饥渴，随后他回过头，若无其事地回答道。{/n}“你是说这处烧伤吗？这不过是猴子的激光枪留下的伤痕罢了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous lance une œillade avide et répond nonchalamment à Kharael par-dessus son épaule.{/n} « Cette brûlure ? C'est la trace d'une charge laser mon-keigh, rien de plus. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a look of smouldering hunger and nonchalantly replies to Kharael over his shoulder.{/n} "You mean this burn? It is but a mark from a mon-keigh laser charge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vous lance une œillade avide et répond nonchalamment à Kharael par-dessus son épaule.{/n} « Cette brûlure ? C'est la trace d'une charge laser mon-keigh, rien de plus. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai te lanza una mirada hambrienta y responde a Kharael de forma despreocupada.{/n} «¿Esta quemadura, dices? Solo es la marca de una carga láser mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a look of smouldering hunger and nonchalantly replies to Kharael over his shoulder.{/n} "You mean this burn? It is but a mark from a mon-keigh laser charge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai te lanza una mirada hambrienta y responde a Kharael de forma despreocupada.{/n} «¿Esta quemadura, dices? Solo es la marca de una carga láser mon-keigh».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは鬱積した渇望を込めた視線であなたを見て、肩ごしにカラエルに気のない返事をする。{/n}「この火傷のことか？モン＝ケイのレーザーチャージの痕さ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a look of smouldering hunger and nonchalantly replies to Kharael over his shoulder.{/n} "You mean this burn? It is but a mark from a mon-keigh laser charge."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは鬱積した渇望を込めた視線であなたを見て、肩ごしにカラエルに気のない返事をする。{/n}「この火傷のことか？モン＝ケイのレーザーチャージの痕さ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sana için için yanan bir açlıkla bakan Marazhai, Kharael'e omzunun üzerinden umursamaz bir yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Bu yanığı mı kastediyorsun? Bir mon-keigh lazer ateşinden kalan bir iz yalnızca."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a look of smouldering hunger and nonchalantly replies to Kharael over his shoulder.{/n} "You mean this burn? It is but a mark from a mon-keigh laser charge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sana için için yanan bir açlıkla bakıyor ve Kharael'e omzunun üzerinden umursamaz bir yanıt veriyor:{/n} "Bu yanığı mı kastediyorsun? Bir mon-keigh lazer ateşinden kalan bir iz yalnızca."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
